questions.question: What is C# primarily designed to be?
options: A modern, easy-to-use language tightly integrated with the .NET Framework
A scripting language for web development
questions.answer: A modern, easy-to-use language tightly integrated with the .NET Framework

questions.question: What are the two main components of the .NET Framework?
options: The Java Virtual Machine (JVM) and the class library
The Common Language Runtime (CLR) and the class library
The runtime environment and the standard template library
questions.answer: The Common Language Runtime (CLR) and the class library

questions.question: How does C# achieve platform independence compared to C or C++?
options: It uses a different compiler for each platform.
It compiles directly to machine code.
It compiles to intermediate language (IL) which is then translated to machine code at runtime.
It uses an interpreter instead of a compiler.
questions.answer: It compiles to intermediate language (IL) which is then translated to machine code at runtime.
